verses.verse: I <S%G4921>commend<s%> to you our <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G5402>Phoebe,<s%> who is a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> which is at <S%G2747>Cenchrea;<s%>

that you <S%G4327>receive<s%> her in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in a <S%G516>manner<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and that you <S%G3936>help<s%> her in <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4229>matter<s%> she may <S%G5535>have<s%> <S%G5535>need<s%> of you; for she <S%G846>herself<s%> has <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G4368>helper<s%> of <S%G4183>many,<s%> and of <S%G1473>myself<s%> as <S%G846>well.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G4251>Prisca<s%> and <S%G207>Aquila,<s%> my <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>workers<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> for my <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5294>risked<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> not <S%G3441>only<s%> do I <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%>

<S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G782>[greet<s%>] the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is in their <S%G3624>house.<s%> Greet <S%G1866>Epaenetus,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G536>first<s%> <S%G536>convert<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> from <S%G773>Asia.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> has <S%G2872>worked<s%> <S%G4183>hard<s%> for you.

<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G408>Andronicus<s%> and <S%G2458>Junias,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsmen,<s%> and my <S%G4869>fellow<s%> <S%G4869>prisoners,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> are <S%G1978>outstanding<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me.
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G291>Ampliatus,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3773>Urbanus,<s%> our <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>worker<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G4720>Stachys<s%> my <S%G27>beloved.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G559>Apelles,<s%> the <S%G1384>approved<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are of the [household] of <S%G711>Aristobulus.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G2267>Herodion,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsman.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> of the [household] of <S%G3488>Narcissus,<s%> who are in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G5170>Tryphaena<s%> and <S%G5173>Tryphosa,<s%> <S%G2872>workers<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G4069>Persis<s%> the <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> has <S%G2872>worked<s%> <S%G4183>hard<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G4504>Rufus,<s%> a <S%G1588>choice<s%> <S%G1588>man<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> his <S%G3384>mother<s%> and <S%G1699>mine.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G799>Asyncritus,<s%> <S%G5393>Phlegon,<s%> <S%G2060>Hermes,<s%> <S%G3969>Patrobas,<s%> <S%G2057>Hermas<s%> and the <S%G80>brethren<s%> with them.

<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G5378>Philologus<s%> and <S%G2456>Julia,<s%> <S%G3517>Nereus<s%> and his <S%G79>sister,<s%> and <S%G3652>Olympas,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> who are with them.
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> with a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>urge<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G4648>keep<s%> your <S%G4648>eye<s%> on <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G1370>dissensions<s%> and <S%G4625>hindrances<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G3129>learned,<s%> and <S%G1578>turn<s%> <S%G1578>away<s%> from them.

For <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>men<s%> are <S%G1398>slaves,<s%> not of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> but of their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2836>appetites;<s%> and by their <S%G5542>smooth<s%> and <S%G2129>flattering<s%> <S%G2129>speech<s%> they <S%G1818>deceive<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of the <S%G172>unsuspecting.<s%>

For the report of your <S%G5218>obedience<s%> has <S%G864>reached<s%> to <S%G3956>all;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> I am <S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> you, but I <S%G2309>want<s%> you to be <S%G4680>wise<s%> in <S%G18>what<s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> and <S%G185>innocent<s%> in <S%G2556>what<s%> is <S%G2556>evil.<s%>

And the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> will <S%G5034>soon<s%> <S%G4937>crush<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> your <S%G4228>feet.<s%> The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> be with you.
<S%G5095>Timothy<s%> my <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>worker<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> you, and [so do] <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> and <S%G2394>Jason<s%> and <S%G4989>Sosipater,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsmen.<s%>
I, <S%G5060>Tertius,<s%> who <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter,<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1050>Gaius,<s%> <S%G3581>host<s%> to me and to the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> you. <S%G2037>Erastus,<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3623>treasurer<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> you, and <S%G2890>Quartus,<s%> the <S%G80>brother.<s%>
[The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>]

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to Him who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4741>establish<s%> you <S%G2596>according<s%> to my <S%G2098>gospel<s%> and the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> which has been <S%G4601>kept<s%> <S%G4601>secret<s%> for <S%G5550>long<s%> <S%G5550>ages<s%> past,

but <S%G3568>now<s%> is <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> and by the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> of the <S%G4397>prophets,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> has been <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations,<s%> [leading] to <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
to the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
